text: Boogie-woogie is a piano-based music style. Boogie-woogie may also refer to: *Boogie-woogie (dance), a swing dance *"Boogie Woogie" (song), a 1995 song by EuroGroove and Dannii Minogue *Boogie Woogie (album), a 1941 compilation album released by Columbia Records *Boogie Woogie (film), a 2009 comedy film *Boogie Woogie (TV series), a dance-based show broadcast in India *Boogie Oogie, a Brazilian telenovela produced by Rede Globo in 2014 *Broadway Boogie Woogie, a 1943 painting by Piet Mondrian * Boogie Woogie Red (1925–1992), American blues musician *"Boogie Oogie Oogie", a 1978 song by A Taste of Honey ==See also== *Oogie Boogie, a character from the animated film The Nightmare Before Christmas
title: Boogie-woogie (disambiguation)
